name: Mars VR
summary: Welcome to Mars VR. This is an immersive first-person shooting game, which used virtual reality technology to develop for VR platform by Zhenyou Network and Yingpei Games. As a key part of Mars whole platform strategy, Mars VR is based on strong technical development experience of Yingpei Games and the new generation of Unreal Engine 4. This game could simulate real gun shooting, complete ballistic model and real physical feedback. The players could control the game freely with body movements, and enjoy strong immersive experience and fierce fighting.
